validator.arg: Error: you cannot select 'Cost reduction' reason for change if you select to create a Standard EC, otherwise, if you select a CR issue you cannot select a reason for change different from 'Cost Reduction'

function.arg:
Dear Colleague,
the <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(componentManager.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObjectByName("EC Type")) %> ${issue.key} has been moved to Step "3 - Queue to implement", please follow the link below to open it

${issue.summary}




Regards

Status of the request $issue.summary with key $issue has been changed...
EC FAAC Reference: $issue

$issue.summary
Status changed to $issue.status.name with Resolution $issue.resolution.name
